title: House Industries: Chalet: London 1970
content:
Over my Christmas slow-down, I stumbled across this, which is the closest I've found to my typeface so far. There are a number of differences, and in the main they are down to me aiming for this to be a contemporary typeface, rather than a 70s throw-back.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011113610im_/http:/typophile.com/files/london1970_5025.jpg)

It is actually only the lower-case that are really similar, I aim for my upper-case set to be much more angular. USeful for reference though!
author: MurrayAllan

comments.content: This is a beautiful beautiful typeface.
agreed, I often use the Chalet family. It is lovely.
